      • intersect

        public static Iterable<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<VectorEntry,VectorEntry>> intersect(SparseVector v1,
                                                                                                        SparseVector v2)

        Iterate over the intersection of two vectors - they keys they have in common.

        Parameters:
        v1 - The first vector.
        v2 - The second vector.
        Returns:
        An iterator over the common pairs. This iterator will never contain null entries.

      • fastIntersect

        public static Iterable<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<VectorEntry,VectorEntry>> fastIntersect(SparseVector v1,
                                                                                                   SparseVector v2)

        Iterate over the intersection of two vectors without the overhead of object creation.

        Parameters:
        v1 - The first vector.
        v2 - The second vector.
        Returns:
        A fast iterator over the common keys of the two vectors.
        See Also:
        intersect(SparseVector, SparseVector)
